channel.title: [pi] hhheeeelllppp! [pi]
channel.description:
Okay Guys, On My Server Void Needs, Magic, Range, atk, Str, Pray, DEF To Wear.. I Like It Like That Just.. Not The Defense One.. How Do I Make It Only Need, Magic, Range, atk, Str, pray To Wear? Basically Just Want To Remove The Defense Requirement.
(Please Reply Even If You Think Its Not Right )

item.title: [pi] hhheeeelllppp! [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[quote=“Abandoned Dreams, post:1, topic:376618”]Okay Guys, On My Server Void Needs, Magic, Range, atk, Str, Pray, DEF To Wear… I Like It Like That Just… Not The Defense One… How Do I Make It Only Need, Magic, Range, atk, Str, pray To Wear?
Basically Just Want To Remove The Defense Requirement.

(Please Reply Even If You Think Its Not Right )[/quote]

[center]
To find the require ments to equip items you go to:

SRC -> Server -> Model -> Items -> ItemAssistant.Java

The use CTRL + F and search item IDS.

This will work if its packaged like PI or is PI.[/center]

Read full topic
